register.name: B%s
register.description: Byte pin registers port 0; pins PIO0_0 to PIO0_31

field.name: PBYTE
field.description: Read: state of the pin P0_n, regardless of direction, masking, or alternate function, except that pins configured as analog I/O always read as 0. Write: loads the pin's output bit

field.name: PBYTE
field.description: Read: state of the pin P1_n, regardless of direction, masking, or alternate function, except that pins configured as analog I/O always read as 0. Write: loads the pin's output bit

field.name: PWORD
field.description: Read 0: pin is LOW. Write 0: clear output bit. Read 0xFFFF FFFF: pin is HIGH. Write any value 0x0000 0001 to 0xFFFF FFFF: set output bit. Only 0 or 0xFFFF FFFF can be read. Writing any value other than 0 will set the output bit

field.name: PWORD
field.description: Read 0: pin is LOW. Write 0: clear output bit. Read 0xFFFF FFFF: pin is HIGH. Write any value 0x0000 0001 to 0xFFFF FFFF: set output bit. Only 0 or 0xFFFF FFFF can be read. Writing any value other than 0 will set the output bit

field.name: DIRP0
field.description: Selects pin direction for pin P0/1_n (bit 0 = P0/1_0, bit 1 = P0_1, ..., bit 31 = P0/1_31). 0 = input. 1 = output

field.name: DIRP1
field.description: Selects pin direction for pin P0/1_n (bit 0 = P0/1_0, bit 1 = P0_1, ..., bit 31 = P0/1_31). 0 = input. 1 = output

field.name: DIRP2
field.description: Selects pin direction for pin P0/1_n (bit 0 = P0/1_0, bit 1 = P0_1, ..., bit 31 = P0/1_31). 0 = input. 1 = output

field.name: MASKP0
field.description: Controls which bits corresponding to P0/1_n are active in the P0/1 PIN register (bit 0 = P0/1_0, bit 1 = P0/1_1, ..., bit 31 = P0/1_31). 0 = Read MPORT: pin state; write MPORT: load output bit. 1 = Read MPORT: 0; write MPORT: output bit not affected

field.name: PORT0
field.description: Reads pin states or loads output bits (bit 0 = P0/1_0, bit 1 = P0/1_1, ..., bit 31 = P0/1_31). 0 = Read: pin is low; write: clear output bit. 1 = Read: pin is high; write: set output bit

field.name: PORT1
field.description: Reads pin states or loads output bits (bit 0 = P0/1_0, bit 1 = P0/1_1, ..., bit 31 = P0/1_31). 0 = Read: pin is low; write: clear output bit. 1 = Read: pin is high; write: set output bit

field.description: Reads pin states or loads output bits (bit 0 = P0/1_0, bit 1 = P0/1_1, ..., bit 31 = P0/1_31). 0 = Read: pin is low; write: clear output bit. 1 = Read: pin is high; write: set output bit

field.name: MPORTP0
field.description: Masked port register (bit 0 = P0/1_0, bit 1 = P0/1_1, ..., bit 31 = P0/1_31). 0 = Read: pin is LOW and/or the corresponding bit in the MASK register is 1; write: clear output bit if the corresponding bit in the MASK register is 0. 1 = Read: pin is HIGH and the corresponding bit in the MASK register is 0; write: set output bit if the corresponding bit in the MASK register is 0

register.name: SET%s
